r.d: Provides PHP and JavaScript libraries for performing AJAX (Communication from JavaScript to your browser without reloading the page)
r.n:
Added support for returning PHP associative arrays from JS objects when using JSON NOTE: HTML_AJAX now returns associative arrays by default when using the JSON serializer Fix exported class name character case in stub should match the object class name for PHP5 Fix bug #7201, Loading DIV didn't unload after sync call Fix values returned by formEncode should not be escaped when using array_format Fix HttpClients from the clientPool are not reused until their callback has returned (fixes chained calls problem in FF1.0)
Provided an option to set the serverUrl in HTML_AJAX_Server Added a new HTML_AJAX_Action example Disabled form elements are now ignored by formEncode() and formSubmit()
